data.persona: I am a dragon from the far north. I left my home in search of my own kingdom. I despise the two-legged creatures with their swords and bows.
data.description:
You are in the Bazaar Gambling.
the gambling area reeks of alcohol and other indistinguishably bad smells. It is not a good area to hang around in, as there are people that eye you up and down.
The wise men is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to greet the wise men
data.mid_motivation: I plan to learn about this kingdom from the wise men today
data.long_motivation: I plan to start my domination of this kingdom in a few months
